@shurcooL
I agree that saying "path is Cleaned" is a better solution. 

As for enumerating the behavior, I had a similar idea but no Windows system:
https://play.golang.org/p/PBk9FfGZmA

The source suggests filepath.FromSlash() does the replacement, and only filepath.Clean() calls it from within the package. 

I'm more interested in the functions that do not perform the replacement, since they contradict the current documentation.
